rukus.text: qasam hai is waazeh kitaab ki
hum ne is ko arabi zabaan ka Qurâ€™aan banaya hai ke tum samajh lo
yaqinan ye lauhe mehfooz mein hai aur hamaare nazdeek bulandh martaba hikmath waali hai
kya hum is nasihath ko tum se is bina par hata le ke tum hadh se guzar jaane waale log ho
aur hum ne agle logo mein bhi kitne hee nabi bheje
jo nabi un ke paas aaya unhone us ka mazaaq udaaya
pas hum ne un se zyaada zoor aawaro ko tabaah kar daala aur aglo ki misaal guzar chuki hai
agar aap un se daryaaft kare ke asmaano aur zameen ko kis ne payda kiya to yaqinan un ka jawaab yahi hoga ke unhe ghaalib wa daana (Allah) ne hee payda kiya hai
wahi hai jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko farsh (bichona) banaya aur us mein tumhaare liye raaste kar diye, ta ke tum raah pa liya karo
osi ne asmaan se ek andaaze ke mutaabiq paani naazil farmaya, pas hum ne us se murda shahar ko zinda kar diya, isi tarah tum nikaale jaoge
jis ne tamaam chizo ke jode banaaye aur tumhaare liye kashtiyaa banayi aur chau paaye jaanwar (payda kiye) jin par tum sawaar hote ho

ta ke tum un ki peet par jam kar sawaar hoa karo phir apne rab ki nemath ko yaadh karo, jab us par theek thaak baith jaao, aur kaho paak zaath hai us ki jis ne ise hamaare bas mein kar diya, halaan ke hamein ise qaabo karne ki taaqath na thi
aur bil yaqeen hum apne rab ki taraf laut kar jaane waale hai
aur unhone Allah ke baaz bandho ko us ka juz tehra diya, yaqinan insaan khullam khulla na shukra hai
